I-II.text: Which month were you born in?
Which is your favourite day of the week?
Who sits next to you in class?
What is the name of your school?
What is the name of the town/city you live in?
Which cartoon show do you like the most?
What do you eat for breakfast?
What toy do you like to play with?
Do you have a pet? What is its name?
What do you see outside your window?

III-V.text: What would you do if you were principal for a day?
Explain how to make your favorite food.
If you could invent something, what would it be?
Describe your favorite book or story.
What would you do if you saw someone being bullied?
Describe a time you helped someone.
What do you think is the most important school rule?
If you could have any superpower, what would you choose?

VI-X.text: Discuss the importance of environmental conservation.
How has technology changed education in recent years?
What are the qualities of an effective leader?
Explain a current event that interests you and why.
How would you address the problem of plastic pollution?
What career are you considering and why?
Discuss the role of social media in modern society.
How can schools better prepare students for the future?
What historical figure do you admire most and why?
Explain the importance of mental health awareness.
